TestDescription.name: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in ofc_upload_image.php
TestDescription.Description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in ofc_upload_image.php in Open Flash Chart v2 Beta 1 through v2 Lug Wyrm Charmer, as used in Piwik 0.2.35 through 0.4.3, Woopra Analytics Plugin before 1.4.3.2, and possibly other products, when register_globals is enabled, allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension through the name parameter with the code in the HTTP_RAW_POST_DATA parameter, then accessing it via a direct request to the file in tmp-upload-images/.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can upload arbitrary scripts on the web server and execute them. This can lead to a full system compromise.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Delete the file ofc_upload_image.php or apply the patch provided by the vendor.
